list-item.p: This study first investigated how COVID-19 and the following measures taken influence the influenza activity in mainland China.
The influenza activity in mainland China declined at the beginning of 2020, soon after COVID-19 have spread all over China.
After public health interventions were taken in late-January, the influenza-positive rate gradually decreased, and approached zero in March, which was much earlier than the seasons before.
COVID-19 and the following measures have significantly changed the circulation of influenza, and the co-circulation of the two types of viruses worth sustained attention.
